channel.title: TheEscapePodCast
channel.description:
Join Paul Anthony and Neil Andrew Eyre as they discuss the Mobile Game Star Wars Galaxy Of Heroes.
One is a Grand Arena Specialist from the UK, the other is a Territory Battle specialist from the U.S. Together, there is no signs of life-forms on board.
channel.author: TheEscapePodCast
channel.itunes:author: TheEscapePodCast
channel.itunes:summary:
Join Paul Anthony and Neil Andrew Eyre as they discuss the Mobile Game Star Wars Galaxy Of Heroes.

item.title: TEPc S2E28: Going Nerdy - Galactic Legends
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast. Galactic Legends are playable now... if you can see them. The plight of the 99% may in turn be a sign of the times. Going Nerdy talks with us about the dreams and aspirations of test account users in this struggling time... yes that was sarcasm. And Patreon's choice was a hit! What do the Patreons have planned for Neil and Paul this week?

Want to donate to the stream? https://streamlabs.com/paulanthonyslawinski

Guest:

Going Nerdy - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo2-8utZr9OCqcfF7uu09Mg

Join our Discord channel and listen to the live recording of each episode at 7:30 eastern / 4:30 Pacific every Friday night / 9:30am NSW Australian Saturday.

The Escape Pod... Recruiting server - https://discord.gg/NA2HHas

The Nev - https://www.youtube.com/user/Neilandreweyre and https://discord.gg/YnqCqPz

To support the Paul Anthony GoFundMe for his wife Kristi: https://www.gofundme.com/mrsanthony

Mikayas Modding Mayhem:- https://discord.gg/39cQGbp

Get in touch with ShittyBill for some of the best BOTS in the game. Tag ShittyBill in our server. 

HELPFUL RESOURCES

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SWGOHEscapePodcast

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheSWEscapePod

To support our channel: https://www.patreon.com/TheEscapePod

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/theescapepodcast/message

item.title: TEPc S2E27: EGraceGamer and CWL
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast, Galactic Legends kits make their way to our hands. We find where CG has gone last week. We talk to CWL creator Kirby about his benefit this weekend. Mental health is the big topic this week as we talk to Jesse, aka EGraceGamer about what to do if you feel overwhelemed, and Patreon's Choice this week in our fourth segment.  

Want to donate to the stream? https://streamlabs.com/paulanthonyslawinski

Guest: CWL  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyn6H14pecDQVEjdhPu6ZaA https://www.twitch.tv/cwluniverse  

The Escape Pod Castaways Network:  http://www.escapepodcastaways.com/  

SWGOH Sheets:  https://discord.gg/UvgxH3z  

Join our Discord channel and get access to the hosts and other benefits!  

The Escape Pod... Recruiting server - https://discord.gg/NA2HHas  

The Nev - https://www.youtube.com/user/Neilandreweyre and https://discord.gg/YnqCqPz  

To support the Paul Anthony GoFundMe for his wife Kristi: https://www.gofundme.com/mrsanthony

item.title: TEPc S2E26: Black Mamba
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast, We talk about the false start of TW, the new content release, the state of the Galaxy which gave SOME people hope. We then sit down with the winningest GAC mastermind we have yet to talk to, Black Mamba. That and we celebrate Nev's 21st anniversary of his 21st birthday.

Want to donate to the stream? https://streamlabs.com/paulanthonyslawinski

item.title: TEPc S2E25: Gridan
item.description:

item.title: TEPc S2E24: AndyBeadz
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast, we get answers to some questions we didn't think CG would answer. But they didn't get to Neil's question which makes him not so happy. We talk to SWGoH Twitch streamer, AndyBeadz. And then we tell you if Lego Legacy Heroes Unboxed is worth a download... and if so, it is worth throwing money at the developers.


Want to donate to the stream? https://streamlabs.com/paulanthonyslawinski

item.title: The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 22)
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast. The Galactic Legend info ramps up, including a way to play the event. The Raddus hits the holotables. EGraceGamer talks with us about GAC, Theory Crafting, and gives us tips of unusual teams. We also say goodbye to yet more content creators this week. All this and more on The Escape Pod... cast!

item.title: The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 19)
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast. We get a drop in the ocean of content that was promised and some promises for the future in The State of the Galaxy Post. Paul gives his State of the Planetary Systems update as well in the form of a Community Rebuttal. Nev is excited to play GAC again and also pleased that we won't cross the streams on Friday nights! Going Nerdy sits down to talk with us about speculation of the new ships and then gets even nerdier as we Talk Picard (with a little bit of Star Wars mixed in) in our Preview Episode of Talking Picard housed in our 4th segment. All this and breaking news as and if it happens right here on The Escape Pod... cast!

item.title: The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 15)
item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast. Paul Anthony is sitting in a cell on Batuu, so Neil enlists the help of Matty Hynes (aka Hynesy) to assume co-hosting duties. Hynesy also reveals his cloning vat and drags his clone of Scotty Mclaren along with him. They talk the year that was, about Matty's channel, and we have the "drama finale" to wrap up the year right here on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast.

item.description:
Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast.  We react to the week that was with 3v3 GAC. Our Hashtag Return to Hoth campaign seemed to pick up some steam. Going Nerdy will be here as we merge streams and Talk Mando in our second segment And SPOILER ALERT, we will be talking Episode 9 in our third segment with him as well. item.title: The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 12)
item.description:
The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 11)

Coming up on this weeks edition of The Escape Pod... cast, Light Side Geonosis Territory Battles take complete shape, We give our thoughts on them, but save some of them for our interview with Mandalore from Mighty Wallets. The Malevolence is coming, The Malevolence is coming! Neil is more interested in what they did for the younger guilds and the rewards for Light Side Hoth. We take some time to tell you what we are truly thankful for in this game in our fourth segment! But that is not the ONLY ONE that is live this week! Thats right we are live for all of our commentary segments this week right here on The Escape Pod... cast.

item.title: The Escape Pod (cast) Season 2 (Episode 10)
item.description:
Coming up this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast. It has been a busy week on the forums, we barely had time to keep up. The road ahead is paved with good intentions. The light side territory battles start to take shape, but Paul doesn't like one of the requirements and writes an open letter to CG. It's their 4th anniversary this weekend and we are getting 3 clone wars chewie shards.... And more! A journey's guide to the journey guide, that doesn't provide much clarity even thought they say it will provide clarity.... Yeah, nev wrote that one... We find out how to get Ki Adi Mundi shards, and it Reeks of confusion. And T-money and Good Ol' Maurice sit down and talk about the end of content... for a certain era, and the begining of another. All this and more along with the LIVE 4th segment, right here on The Escape Pod Cast.

Operation Metaverse  - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkPNFmgcWStaojVHg0wgw2g

Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast

We have a new Senior Producer at Capital Games for Star Wars Galaxy of Heroes. We get a work in progress preview of relics and new frames. Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast

The british are coming, the british are coming! And They have invaded this week's interview segments and we have no problem with that at all

Topics include GAC's return, Malak is Back, What is Bossk's dark secret continue listening to find out!

We sit down with The Nev and Michael Hunt at the holo round table, and DB Offical finally joins the show! Plus a very special interview that we have had up our sleeve awaiting the return of Malak.

All this, and if more news breaks today we will have a Special Escape Pod cast extra after the show, because we're on tape this week!

Right here on The Escape Pod... cast.

Coming up on this week's edition of The Escape Pod... cast

The british are coming, the british are coming! And They have invaded this week's interview segments and we have no problem with that at all

item.title: The Escape Pod (Cast) Season 1 (Episode 16)
item.description:
Coming up on this weeks edition of The Escape Pod.. cast. We talk Title Update 16 coinciding with our 16th episode, coincidence? I think not! We find out about some new characters with some new unique abilities, the Territory Battle of Geonosis is revealed! What lies in store for us within the Arena? And we release CG_Carrie from the brig after she was caught sneaking onto our ship, to sit down and talk all these things and MORE! Normally I would say breaking news and and if it happens, but Ladies and gentlemen, this IS the breaking news, this week, on The Escape Pod... cast!

We talk all things SWGOH. Two radio hosts from opposite ends of the world converge to bring you the premiere pod cast about the mobile game Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes.  Hosted by Scotty McLaren and Paul Anthony

item.title: The Escape Pod (Cast) Season 1 (Episode 11)
item.description:
Coming Up on the Escape Pod...Cast... Coming Up on the Escape Pod...Cast... Do You Know Da Wae? Have we found our Queen? Dook-U have a Greivance now? Who will we fight on Padme's Team? B1 And Droideka become Farmable...Is there another Panic Farm? Jango Fett's services are no longer needed with Director Krennic? Princess Leia is tagged in for Hoth Rebel Soldier? Will Anakin get a re-work, or a touch up? Why it's a silly time to quit the game, The Nev has some great advice for all players in the Escape Pod Cast For Kids, we chat to some new content creators from the Syndicate and the Top 10 3 V 3 Teams we have found in Grand Arena. Will it be May The 4th Be With You or Revenge Of The 6th? All this and breaking news as it happens on the Escape Pod...Cast.
